name: user-management-system
description: The User Management System is a Node.js-based application designed to handle user registration, authentication, and profile management. Built with scalability and security in mind, this system provides features such as user role assignments, password hashing, and session management. It includes robust validation and error handling to ensure data integrity and user experience. This project serves as a foundational tool for managing users in web applications, making it easy to integrate with other services and expand as needed.
author: Hammad Rahim
